abstract: Many rural and peri-urban smallholder farmers and agribusinesses struggle to access financial institutions, especially in Sub-Saharan Africa. Only 23% of adults in Sub-Saharan Africa were able to save in order to start, operate, or expand a farm or other business, and only 30% of adults living in rural areas had any financial account.

shorttitle: How Can Digital Finance Support Agriculture? Using Alternative Data Sources to Support Consumer Protection
